meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unlovely.
meanings.sent1: The unloveliness of the old building made it stand out in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't deny the unloveliness of the abandoned house.
meanings.sent3: Despite its unloveliness, the quirky little cafe had the best coffee in town.
meanings.sent4: The unloveliness of the situation was like a dark cloud hanging over their heads.
meanings.sent5: The unloveliness of the painting was so striking that it left a lasting impression on everyone who saw it.

meanings.definition: The lack of attractiveness or beauty.
meanings.sent1: The unloveliness of the barren landscape was almost haunting.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't help but notice the unloveliness of the wilted flowers.
meanings.sent3: The unloveliness of the situation was so comical that they couldn't help but laugh.
meanings.sent4: The unloveliness of the weather mirrored her gloomy mood.
meanings.sent5: The unloveliness of the dress made her feel self-conscious at the party.
